showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:20}); // {Cloud}
“You're pushin' it, {Cait Sith}!
You gotta lot of nerve staying with us
all the while being a spy!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:37}); // {Cloud}
“He won't come clean.
And he won't quit being a spy.”{PAUSE}“We can't go on with
someone like that.
Pull your head out!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:54}); // {Cloud}
“…Well, we're stuck…
We'll have to do what he says.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:16}); // {Aeris}
“…I trusted you.
I can't believe you!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:24}); // {Aeris}
“So you're from Shinra.
Who? Who are you!
Tell me!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:34}); // {Aeris}
“…And so on, and so on…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:56}); // {Aeris}
“I wonder if Marlene is all right…
I wonder what happened to Mom?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:25}); // {Barret}
“Who the hell are ya!?
What's your real name!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:35}); // {Barret}
“Hmph! You ain't foolin' us this time!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:23}); // {Tifa}
“So you're from Shinra.
Who are you?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:26}); // {Yuffie}
“Part of the Shinra!
Who the *&$# are you!?”

ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // {Cait Sith}
“W,
a second.
I won't run or hide.”{PAUSE}“Yes, I was a spy.
I was hired by the Shinra.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:19}); // {Cait Sith}
“I can't help it.
What's done is done.
That's just the way it is.”{PAUSE}“How 'bout if we go on like
nothing ever happened?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:21}); // {Cait Sith}
“Then, what are you goin' to do?
Destroy me?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:27}); // {Cait Sith}
“Whoa, I can't tell you my name.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:29}); // {Cait Sith}
“Right? I told you!
Talking won't do any good, so can't
we just continue our journey?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:30}); // {Cait Sith}
“…Alright, yes, I am a Shinra employee.”
“But we're not completely enemies.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:31}); // {Cait Sith}
“…Something bothers me.
I think it's you're ways of living”{PAUSE}“You don't get paid
You don't get praised. And yet you
still risk your lives and continue on
your journey. Seeing that makes me…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:32}); // {Cait Sith}
“It just makes me think about my life.
I don't think I'd feel too good
if things ended the way it is now.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:38}); // {Cait Sith}
“…I thought so.
It won't do any good talking to you.”{PAUSE}“So, I've prepared myself in case
something like this happened.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:39}); // {Cait Sith}
“Why don't you listen to this.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:49}); // {Cait Sith}
“…So, there's no other way
but to listen to me.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:51}); // {Cait Sith}
“I didn't want to do this either.
Not by using dirty tricks
and taking hostages…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:52}); // {Cait Sith}
“So, this is how it is.
There's no room for compromises.
So why don't we go on as we did.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:53}); // {Cait Sith}
“Tomorrow is the Temple of the Ancients, right?
I know where it is
so I'll tell you later.”{PAUSE}“Of course we'll get there after the Shinra,
but you'll have to deal with that.”

ops.raw: a5 00 00 d9 ff 1c f9 9a fe a6 00

dialogStrings:
{Cait Sith}
“Hey! Look here!
The Key Materia!”

{Cait Sith}
“W,
a second.
I won't run or hide.”{PAUSE}“Yes, I was a spy.
I was hired by the Shinra.”

{Aeris}
“…I trusted you.
I can't believe you!”

{Cait Sith}
“I can't help it.
What's done is done.
That's just the way it is.”{PAUSE}“How 'bout if we go on like
nothing ever happened?”

{Cloud}
“You're pushin' it, {Cait Sith}!
You gotta lot of nerve staying with us
all the while being a spy!”

{Cait Sith}
“Then, what are you goin' to do?
Destroy me?”

{Cait Sith}
“You'd just be wastin' your time if you tried.
This body's just a toy anyway.”{PAUSE}“My real body's at Shinra Headquarters
in Midgar.
I'm controlin' this
toy cat from there.”

{Tifa}
“So you're from Shinra.
Who are you?”

{Aeris}
“So you're from Shinra.
Who? Who are you!
Tell me!”

{Barret}
“Who the hell are ya!?
What's your real name!?”

{Yuffie}
“Part of the Shinra!
Who the *&$# are you!?”

{Cait Sith}
“Whoa, I can't tell you my name.”

{Cait Sith}
“Right? I told you!
Talking won't do any good, so can't
we just continue our journey?”

{Cait Sith}
“…Alright, yes, I am a Shinra employee.”
“But we're not completely enemies.”

{Cait Sith}
“…Something bothers me.
I think it's you're ways of living”{PAUSE}“You don't get paid
You don't get praised. And yet you
still risk your lives and continue on
your journey. Seeing that makes me…”

{Cait Sith}
“It just makes me think about my life.
I don't think I'd feel too good
if things ended the way it is now.”

{Barret}
“Hmph! You ain't foolin' us this time!”

{Cloud}
“He won't come clean.
And he won't quit being a spy.”{PAUSE}“We can't go on with
someone like that.
Pull your head out!”

{Cait Sith}
“…I thought so.
It won't do any good talking to you.”{PAUSE}“So, I've prepared myself in case
something like this happened.”

{Cait Sith}
“Why don't you listen to this.”

“Hey! It's dad!
Dad! It's me, Marlene!”

“Hey! It's the flower lady!
Flower lady…”

{Cait Sith}
“…So, there's no other way
but to listen to me.”

{Cait Sith}
“I didn't want to do this either.
Not by using dirty tricks
and taking hostages…”

{Cait Sith}
“So, this is how it is.
There's no room for compromises.
So why don't we go on as we did.”

{Cait Sith}
“Tomorrow is the Temple of the Ancients, right?
I know where it is
so I'll tell you later.”{PAUSE}“Of course we'll get there after the Shinra,
but you'll have to deal with that.”

{Cloud}
“…Well, we're stuck…
We'll have to do what he says.”

{Aeris}
“I wonder if Marlene is all right…
I wonder what happened to Mom?”
